text:
@CNN Well,you would know?
You attacked R.Paul because he wasn’t qualified enough to question Dr. Fauci.
Then you announced Greta Thunberg would be on a coronavirus panel,Lol!
When did she become “qualified” enough to speak on a global pandemic? You just pulled a Stelterism!
#FakeNews

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
